body.name: SnugMaker Stanley Cup Accessories Set for Stanley Cup 63 Pcs Including Straw Covers Cap, Spill Proof Stopper, Charm, Silicone Boot, Straw, Sticker Stanley Accessories for Stanley Cup 40oz ＆ 30oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 6 hrs 7 mins
features: Abundant Package: 63 Pcs Perfect Stanley Cup Accessories Set, Including 3× Silicone Spill Stopper, 2× Silicone Straw Cover Cap for Stanley Cup, 1× Straight Stainless Steel Straw, 1× Bent Stainless Steel Straw, 1× Chain 4× Charm, 1× Silicone Boot Sleeve, 50× sticker, All Compatible with Stanley Cup 40oz & 30oz 2.0.

Practicality: Our leak-proof stopper features a 360° leak-proof design, so you no longer need to worry about accidental spills when your cup is knocked over. The silicone bottle boot prevents unnecessary scratches, dents, offers abrasion resistance, anti-slip properties, reduces noise, and extends the lifespan of your water bottle. The interchangeable use of two straws enhances hygiene. The silicone straw cover provides a dust and splash-proof seal for your health.

Uniqueness: Waterproof stickers and pendants can both adorn your Stanley Cup, and we provide four different pendants for you to interchange. The stickers are DIY-friendly, allowing you to showcase your personality. After decorating your cup, it's less likely to be confused with someone else's. Create your one-of-a-kind Stanley Cup!

High-Quality Silicone: The silicone included in this Stanley water cup accessory set is made from food-grade silicone. It's durable, odorless, and reusable. The material is soft, easy to clean, and can be washed by hand or in a dishwasher. The straws are made from food-grade stainless steel material, which is healthy, durable, rust-resistant, and easy to clean.

All-in-One Stanley Accessories Set: Our Stanley cup accessory set includes the essential accessories that most people need, so you won't have to worry about matching or finding additional items. If your friends, family, or loved ones are using Stanley cups, why not purchase our gift set for them? It will be the perfect accessory combination they receive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Cute Accessories
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SnugMaker Stanley Cup Accessories 63 Pcs set and I have to say, I am extremely impressed with the quality and variety of items included in this set.First of all, the packaging is very eye-catching and the pink color scheme is perfect for any girly hockey fan. The set includes 63 pieces, which is a great value for the price. It includes straw covers, a spill-proof stopper, charms, a silicone boot, a straw, and sticker accessories.The straw covers are a great addition to any drink, especially for those who like to use reusable straws. They fit snugly on the straw and prevent any spills or leaks. The spill-proof stopper is also a game-changer. It fits perfectly on the top of the cup and prevents any spills or leaks, making it perfect for on-the-go use.The charms included in the set are adorable and add a fun touch to any cup. They are easy to attach and remove, so you can switch them up depending on your mood. The silicone boot is also a great addition, as it provides extra grip and protection for your cup.I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the straw included in the set. It is made of durable material and is the perfect size for any cup. The sticker accessories are also a fun addition, allowing you to personalize your cup even further.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of the SnugMaker Stanley Cup Accessories 63 Pcs set. It has everything I need to make my cup stand out and it is all of high quality. I would highly recommend this set to any hockey fan, especially those who love the color pink. It would also make a great gift for any occasion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These accessories are wonderful!
reviews.reviewText: The boot and charms were what mostly drew me into ordering these, but I love the entire accessory package. The stickers are lovely and I'm definitely going to put them to use, just perhaps not on my tumbler. I appreciate the straw options as well, they are sturdy and indeed match the diameter of the original Stanley straw for my 40 oz tumbler. Everything is exactly as pictured and comes packaged in a nice little box that meant I could safely store them away without worrying about using plastic bags or other such methods. My only gripe is the chain being silver when I'd have preferred a gold or rose gold. Not enough to dock any points because the chain itself works as intended and holds up well. I think these are a terrific value overall and I would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are bomb, very cute retro 90's vibe. the stickers stick well to certain types of bottles but not on all bottles. You just wont know until you put the sticker on. Very goood quality, looks amazing and makes a good project for crafts or for putting stickers on bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy tumblr cup accessories
reviews.reviewText: I love all the dainty charms that are in this set, it’s perfect for the upcoming spring and summer! The stickers are cute too I really like the colors and the way I can personalize my cup My way! The straw covering is ideal and very convenient I don’t know I never thought of this sooner, I like the sleeve because it keeps my cup from sliding to and from

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The straw caps are handy to keep the bees out of the straw in the summer and the stickers are cute to decorate my favorite pink cup. The charms are also a pleasant addition to the whole package. The silicone boot is a nice addition to quiet or muffle the clang of sitting the cup on hard surfaces. The covers and boot fit my Stanley dupe perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pink is exactly as pictured. The silicone/rubber is soft but feels sturdy. The piece that goes on the bottom of the cup fits perfectly. The straws are nice and wide. The straw caps fit perfectly on them too.Also, I am absolutely in LOVE with the stickers in this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of goodies to personalize your cup
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loved this… it came with so many things she could use to personalize her cup, with plenty left over to share with her friends. There is stickers, straws, charms, straw covers,… everything was really cute, and nicely made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love these. Tops, stickers and charms are excellent quality and look great.
